mods.abstract: MULATTO-BOY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 30th of June last, a mulatto-boy, calling himself JIM or JAMES, and saying he belongs to Mrs. Thomas Knox, residing in the Parish of St. Landry. This boy is about 17 years old, four feet, six inches high, speaks only English and is light complected. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be dealt with according to law. LOUIS L. BOUTTE, Jailor Opelousas, July 1st., 1854.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
